caption.center: LEONARD P. COTTIERO ET AL. v. DONALD W. IFKOVIC, JR., ET AL.

opinion.opinion_text: The defendant Chemical Bank's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 35 Conn. App. 682 (AC 12997), is denied.
opinion.attorneys:
Gerald L. Garlick, in support of the petition.
Raymond A. Garcia and Gregory R. Faulkner, in opposition.
